resources.string: Using your real name makes it easier for friends to recognize you.
We\'ll help you create a new account in a few easy steps
You\'ll use this number when you log in and if you ever need to resetyour password
Your birthday can be hidden from your friends
Providing gender creates the best Facebook experience for you.
Remember this password. A password helps prevent strangers from using your account.
By singing up you are agree to our facebook and that you have read our data policy, including our cookies use. You may receive SMS Notifications From facebook and opt-out any time

Info about your contacts in your address book, including names, phone numbers and nicknames will be continuously uploaded to facebook to help and other find friends faster and to help us provide a better service. You will be able to manage or delete contacts information you share with facebook, and you can turn off at any time in settings
Sign up without uploading my contacts
